refnamediv.refpurpose: FTP get command; Virtuoso FTP client

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Virtuoso has FTP client functionality, that can be used inside Virtuoso/PL. This Virtuoso function mimics the FTP get command. As with any PL, this can be combined with Web Services and SOAP.

refsect2.title: server
refsect2.para: The remote server address or IP Address.

refsect2.title: user
refsect2.para: The username for authentication at the FTP server.

refsect2.title: pass
refsect2.para: The accompanying password for authentication at the FTP server.

refsect2.title: remote_file_name
refsect2.para: Full path and file name to the file on the FTP server to be downloaded.

refsect2.title: local_file_name
refsect2.para: The full path and file name of the local save point. This is relative to the server root directory. This directory must be included in DirsAllowed ACL list in the Virtuoso.INI file.

refsect2.title: is_pasv
refsect2.para: Flag to specify whether to use passive mode. This can be one "1" for passive mode, or zero "0" for active mode. One "1" is assumed by default.

refsect1.title: Return Types
refsect1.para: This function returns the size of the file written to the local file system.

refsect1.title: Errors
refsect1.para: This function will return any errors returned by the remote FTP server.
